message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $80 to both of us, and I believe it could greatly benefit you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $75 today. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm looking to spend no more than $70 for this product. Would you be willing to go that low for a quick sale?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your proposal and sell the product to you for $72.
